00041 /*! This class provides storages and parsing capabilities of INI files. */
00042 class CIniFile
00043 {
00044 public:
00045 
00046         /*! Structure for storing INI information */
00047         struct Record
00048         {
00049                 std::string Comments;
00050                 char Commented;
00051                 std::string Section;
00052                 std::string Key;
00053                 std::string Value;
00054         };
00055 
00056         /*! Enumerant for identifying characters used for comments */
00057         enum CommentChar
00058         {
00059                 Pound = '#',
00060                 SemiColon = ';'
00061         };
00062 
00063         /*! Constructor */
00064         CIniFile(void);
00065 
00066         /*! Destructor */
00067         virtual ~CIniFile(void);
00068 
00069         /*! Returns the contents of a specific key within a given section
00070          * @param KeyName Key name of interest
00071          * @param SectionName Section name of interest
00072          * @param FileName Name of file
00073          * @return Record structure that contains the contents of specific section and key
00074          */
00075         std::vector<Record> GetRecord(std::string KeyName, std::string SectionName, std::string FileName);
00076 
00077         /*! Returns all key contents of a specific section
00078          * @param SectionName Section name of interest
00079          * @param FileName Name of file
00080          * @return Vector of record structures that contain the contents of all keys in a section
00081          */
00082         std::vector<Record> GetSection(std::string SectionName, std::string FileName);
00083 
00084         /*! Returns all sections names of a given file
00085          * @param FileName Name of file
00086          * @return Vector of section names
00087          */
00088         std::vector<std::string> GetSectionNames(std::string FileName);
00089         
00090         /*! Returns the value of a specific key within a given section
00091          * @param KeyName Key name of interest
00092          * @param SectionName Section name of interest
00093          * @param FileName Name of file
00094          * @return String that contains the value associated with a specific key wihtin a given section
00095          */
00096         std::string GetValue(std::string KeyName, std::string SectionName, std::string FileName);
00097 
00098         /*! Returns all key contents of the file.
00099          *      @param FileName Name of file.
00100          *      @return Vector of all record structures that contain the contents of all keys in all sections of the file.
00101          */
00102         std::vector<Record> GetAllRecords(std::string FileName);
00103 
00104 private:
00105         /*! Returns all key contents of all sections
00106          * @param FileName Name of file
00107          * @return Vector of record structures that contain the key contents all sections
00108          */
00109         std::vector<Record> GetSections(std::string FileName);
00110 
00111         /*! Load the contents of the INI file
00112          * @param FileName Name of file
00113          * @param content Vector of record structures that contain all keys within all sections
00114          * @return True if successful
00115          */
00116         bool Load(std::string FileName, std::vector<Record>& content);  
00117 
00118         /*! Function to trim whitespace from both sides of a given string
00119          * @param str String to perform the whitespace trimming on
00120          * @param ChrsToTrim String of white space characters to search when trimming input string
00121          * @param TrimDir Direction to perform the whitespace trimming on (left, right, both)
00122          */
00123         void Trim(std::string& str, const std::string & ChrsToTrim = " \t\n\r", int TrimDir = 0);
00124 
00125         /*! Structure for determining a match of a given section and key */
00126         struct RecordSectionKeyIs : std::unary_function<Record, bool>
00127         {
00128                 /*! The section name */
00129                 std::string section_;
00130 
00131                 /*! The section name */
00132                 std::string key_;
00133 
00134                 /*! Constructor */
00135                 RecordSectionKeyIs(const std::string& section, const std::string& key): section_(section),key_(key){}
00136 
00137                 /*! Operator for checking a section name and key name match
00138                  * @param rec The record object to perform match against
00139                  * @return True if successful
00140                  */
00141                 bool operator()( const Record& rec ) const
00142                 {
00143                         return ((rec.Section == section_)&&(rec.Key == key_));
00144                 }
00145         };
00146 };
